entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
